traits.label: bordered
traits.name: :bordered
traits.desc: Applies a default border to the component

traits.label: separator
traits.name: :separator
traits.desc: Applies a separator between contained items

traits.label: dark
traits.name: :dark
traits.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

traits.label: padding
traits.name: :padding
traits.desc: Applies a material design-like padding on top and bottom
